body_content.explanation: people or organizations who have too much control or influence over city government, especially in a way that is wrong and dishonest, and especially the political organization that existed in New York City in the 19th and early 20th century :
examples: This decision has the potential to bring an end to Tammany Hall politics.
As a Tammany boss in control of the city planning department, he had a lot of control in deciding what buildings would be erected in the city.
